verses.verse: בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become מָק֣וֹר <WH4726> there shall be a fountain נִפְתָּ֔ח <WH6605> opened לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> to the house דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> of David וּלְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and to the inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem לְחַטַּ֖את <WH2403> for sin וּלְנִדָּֽה׃ <WH5079> and for uncleanness

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> will come בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אַכְרִ֞ית <WH3772> [that] I will cut off אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֤וֹת <WH8034> the names הָֽעֲצַבִּים֙ <WH6091> of the idols מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> out of the land וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> will no יִזָּכְר֖וּ <WH2142> and they shall no more be remembered ע֑וֹד <WH5750> longer וְגַ֧ם <WH1571> will also אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <WH5030> and also I will cause the prophets וְאֶת־ <WH853> ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> spirit הַטֻּמְאָ֖ה <WH2932> and the unclean אַעֲבִ֥יר <WH5674> to pass מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> out of the land

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> and if יִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> shall yet prophesy אִישׁ֮ <WH376> And it shall come to pass [that] when any עוֹד֒ <WH5750> still וְאָמְר֣וּ <WH559> him shall say אֵ֠לָיו <WH413> then אָבִ֨יו <WH1> then his father וְאִמּ֤וֹ <WH517> and his mother יֹֽלְדָיו֙ <WH3205> that begat לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִֽחְיֶ֔ה <WH2421> unto him Thou shalt not live כִּ֛י <WH3588> and if שֶׁ֥קֶר <WH8267> lies דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> for thou speakest בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּדְקָרֻ֜הוּ <WH1856> him shall thrust אָבִ֧יהוּ <WH1> and his father וְאִמּ֛וֹ <WH517> and his mother יֹלְדָ֖יו <WH3205> that begat בְּהִנָּבְאֽוֹ׃ <WH5012> him through when he prophesieth

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יֵבֹ֧שׁוּ <WH954> shall be ashamed הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <WH5030> [that] the prophets אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one מֵחֶזְיֹנ֖וֹ <WH2384> of his vision בְּהִנָּֽבְאֹת֑וֹ <WH5012> when he hath prophesied וְלֹ֧א <WH3808> and they will not יִלְבְּשׁ֛וּ <WH3847> neither shall they wear אַדֶּ֥רֶת <WH155> garment שֵׂעָ֖ר <WH8181> a rough לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> order כַּחֵֽשׁ׃ <WH3584> to deceive

וְאָמַ֕ר <WH559> But he shall say לֹ֥א <WH3808> I am not נָבִ֖יא <WH5030> I [am] no prophet אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> I אִישׁ־ <WH376> he עֹבֵ֤ד <WH5647> serve אֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> of the ground אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> I כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אָדָ֖ם <WH120> for man הִקְנַ֥נִי <WH7069> taught me to keep cattle מִנְּעוּרָֽי׃ <WH5271> from my youth

וְאָמַ֣ר <WH559> And [one] shall say אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him מָ֧ה <WH4100> What הַמַּכּ֛וֹת <WH4347> unto him What [are] these wounds הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> are these בֵּ֣ין <WH996> between יָדֶ֑יךָ <WH3027> and one וְאָמַ֕ר <WH559> will say אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֻכֵּ֖יתִי <WH5221> [Those] with which I was wounded בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> [in] the house מְאַהֲבָֽי׃ <WH157> of my friends ס

חֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> O sword עוּרִ֤י <WH5782> Awake עַל־ <WH5921> against רֹעִי֙ <WH7473> shipherd וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against גֶּ֣בֶר <WH1397> and against the man עֲמִיתִ֔י <WH5997> [that is] my fellow נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הַ֤ךְ <WH5221> smite אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽרֹעֶה֙ <WH7462> against my shepherd וּתְפוּצֶ֣יןָ <WH6327> shall be scattered הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> and the sheep וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֥י <WH7725> and I will turn יָדִ֖י <WH3027> mine hand עַל־ <WH5921> against הַצֹּעֲרִֽים׃ <WH6819> upon the little ones

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> will come בְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> And it shall come to pass [that] in all the land נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD פִּֽי־ <WH6310> parts שְׁנַ֣יִם <WH8147> two בָּ֔הּ יִכָּרְת֖וּ <WH3772> therein shall be cut off יִגְוָ֑עוּ <WH1478> [and] die וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <WH7992> but the third יִוָּ֥תֶר <WH3498> shall be left בָּֽהּ׃

וְהֵבֵאתִ֤י <WH935> And I will bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <WH7992> the third part בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> through the fire וּצְרַפְתִּים֙ <WH6884> and will refine כִּצְרֹ֣ף <WH6884> is refined אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> them as silver וּבְחַנְתִּ֖ים <WH974> and will try כִּבְחֹ֣ן <WH974> is tried אֶת־ <WH853> הַזָּהָ֑ב <WH2091> them as gold ה֣וּא ׀ <WH1931> They יִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> they shall call בִשְׁמִ֗י <WH8034> on my name וַֽאֲנִי֙ <WH589> and I אֶעֱנֶ֣ה <WH6030> and I will hear אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> them I will say עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> It [is] my people ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְה֥וּא <WH1931> I יֹאמַ֖ר <WH559> and they shall say יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> [is] my God ס
